title: Z Flip 3: actually it's fashion
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 is a totally normal phone with one weird folding trick. Now that it's crossed that barrier, why does it exist? Samsung wants the answer to be fashion, but in this return to the Processor video series, Dieter Bohn looks closer at what it means when phones try to be fashion.
